 retry settings.  There are at least 7 threads and 7 sites and my retry set=
tings are set to 3 retries times 30 sec.  I'm open to any other suggestions=
.  Thanks.

> My crawl jobs are slowing down drastically at the end of the crawl=

nderstand if the active thread count was reduced significantly, but

sn't.  The CPU usage just takes a downward spiral.  Is there a

n amount of time?  Any help would be appreciated.

This is not unusual (oth=
ers may correct me if I=E2=80=99m wrong). Often times you have basically ru=
n out of URLs except for a large number on one site. Heritrix doesn=E2=80=
=99t want to hit that site too hard, so getting those last URLs can take a =
long time.
